alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Lower Brewster County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 7:38PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Brewster County through 845 PM CDT... At 737 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Persimmon Gap, or 30 miles northeast of Panther Junction, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Brewster County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Lower Brewster County
